name: Transgender Bridget for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Transgender penis for personage Bridget for the game Boobs 'em up.

This DLC include 5 different penis size.

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages. There is a button "Transgender" which turn on and off penis and change its size, so you can select which one you like.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
